gurmukhi: keI swsqR isMmiRiq bKwn ] khUM kQq hI su purwn ]11]41]
transliteration: Kaee Saastra Sinmrit(i) Bakhaan|| Kahoon Kathat Hoo Su Puraan||11||41||
translation: Many elucideate Shastras and Smritis, many hold discourses of Puranas. 11.41.

gurmukhi: keI Agn hoqR krMq ] keI aurD qwp durMq ]
transliteration: Kaee Agad Hotra Karant|| Kaee Uradh Taap Durant||
translation: Many perform Agnihotras (fire-worship); many perform arduous austerities while standing.

gurmukhi: keI aurD bwhu sMinAws ] khUM jog Bys audws ]12]42]
transliteration: Kaee Uradh Baah(u) Sanniaas|| Kahoon Jog Bhes Udaas||12||42||
translation: Many are ascetics with raised arms and many are anchorities. Many are in the garbs of Yogis and Udasis (stoics). 12.42.

gurmukhi: khUM invlI krm krMq ] khUM paun Ahwr durMq ]
transliteration: Kahoon Nivaloo Karam Karant|| Kahoon Paoun Ahaar Durant||
translation: Many perform Neoli rituals of Yogis of purging intestines. There are innumerable who subsist on air.

gurmukhi: khUM qIrQ dwn Apwr ] khUM j`g krm audwr ]13]43]
transliteration: Kahoon Teerath Daan Apaar|| Kahoon Jagg Karam Udaar||13||43||
translation: Many offer great charities at pilgrim-stations. Benevolent sacrificial rituals are performed 13.43.

gurmukhi: khUM Agn hoqR AnUp ] khUM inAwie rwj ibBUq ]
transliteration: Kahoon Agad Hotra Anoop|| Kahoon Niaae Raaj Bibhoot||
translation: Somewhere exquisite fire-worship is arranged. Somewhere justice is done with emblem of royalty.

gurmukhi: khUM swsqR isMmiRiq rIq ] khUM byd isau ibpRIq ]14]44]
transliteration: Kahoon Saastra Sinmrit(i) Root|| Kahoon Bed Sio Biproot||14||44||
translation: Somewhere ceremonies are performed in accordance with Shastras and Smritis, somewhere the performance is antagonistic to Vedic injunctions. 14.44.

gurmukhi: keI dys dys iPrMq ] keI eyk TOr iesQMq ]
transliteration: Kaee Des Des Phirant|| Kaee Ek Thaur Isthant||
translation: Many wander in various countries, many stay only at one place.

gurmukhi: khUM krq jl mih jwp ] khUM srq qn pr qwp ]15]45]
transliteration: Kahoon Karat Jal Maih Jaap|| Kahoon Sahat Tan Par Taap||15||45||
translation: Somewhere the meditation is performed in water, somewhere heat is endured on the body.15.45.

gurmukhi: khUM bws bnih krMq ] khUM qwp qnih shMq ]
transliteration: Kahoon Baas Banah(i) Karant|| Kahoon Taap Tanah(i) Sahant||
translation: Somewhere some reside in the forest, somewhere heat is endured on the body.

gurmukhi: khUM giHsq Drm Apwr ] khUM rwj rIq audwr ]16]46]
transliteration: Kahoon Grihsat Dharam Apaar|| Kahoon Raaj Root Udaar||16||46||
translation: Somewhere many follow the householderâ€™s path, somewhere many followed.16.46.

gurmukhi: khUM rog rhq ABrm ] khUM krm krq Akrm ]
transliteration: Kahoon Rog Rahat Abharam|| Kahoon Karam Karat Akaram||
translation: Somewhere people are without ailment and illusion, somewhere forbidden actions are being done.

gurmukhi: khUM syK bHm srUp ] khUM nIq rwj AnUp ]17]47]
transliteration: Kahoon Sekh Brahm Daroop|| Kahoon Noot Raaj Anoop||1747||
translation: Somewhere there are Sheikhs, somewhere there ate Brahmins, somewhere there is the prevalence of unique politics.17.47.

gurmukhi: khUM rog sog ibhIn ] khUM eyk Bgq ADIn ]
transliteration: Kahoon Rog Sog Bihoon|| Kahoon Ek Bhagad Adhoon||
translation: Somewhere someone is without suffering and ailment, somewhere someone follows the path of devotion closely.
